typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employees
source(output(
		Depid as string,
		Depname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Departments
Employees, Departments join(department == Depid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['hari.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		empid,
		name,
		country,
		Depid,
		Depname
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
